Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.toasts

Class DynamicToast.Config

java.lang.Object
com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.toasts.DynamicToast.Config
Enclosing class:
DynamicToast
public static class DynamicToast.Config extends Object
Configuration class to customise the DynamicToast attributes.
